summary.span: 将 对象的集合编码为图像流。

span.span: Encodes a collection of objects to an image stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的编解码器还可能对于专用的编码属性，用于确定编码位图的方式提供支持。A derived codec may also provide support for specialized encoding properties, which are used to determine how a bitmap is encoded. 例如，支持的编解码器可能支持专用的压缩例程或编码图像的交错。For example, a codec may support specialized compression routines or interlacing of an encoded image. 即使位图格式只支持一个帧，可以为任何派生编码器中指定多个帧。You can specify multiple frames for any derived encoder, even if the bitmap format only supports one frame. 在这种情况下，只是第一个框被保存。In this case, only the first frame is saved. 帧的集合可以是编码一次一个地向任意数量的文件流。The collection of frames can be encoded one at a time to any number of file streams. 编码不工作不在部分信任环境中。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)有关部分信任的信息。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用派生类对图像进行编码。The following example demonstrates how to use the derived class to encode an image.
